parameters.name: FilePathIn
parameters.description: Path and filename for the new part

parameters.name: Face_or_Plane_to_select
parameters.description: Face or reference plane where to insert the new part

title: IAssemblyDoc.InsertNewPart2
description: Inserts a new part on the specified face or plane.
signature:
System.Int32 InsertNewPart2( 
   System.String
FilePathIn
,
   System.Object
Face_or_Plane_to_select
)

parameters.name: FilePathIn
parameters.description: Path and filename for the new part

parameters.name: Face_or_Plane_to_select
parameters.description: Face or reference plane where to insert the new part

returns: Error code as defined by swInsertNewPartErrorCode_e
remarks:
The Face_or_Plane_to_select argument can be a
face
or
reference plane
, which means that you have to call
IFeature::GetSpecificFeature2
first.
